nodes.speaker: Isaiah
nodes.text: Hmph. Another distraction. Maria, it is your {action_move}.

nodes.speaker: Maria
nodes.text: Hush, Isaiah. Don't be rude. Hello, stranger. We are {action_playing} a {concept_game}. It requires one to {action_think} carefully.

nodes.speaker: Maria
nodes.text: To {action_think} is to {action_use} your {concept_mind}. To {action_find} an idea or an {concept_answer}. It is a very important {action_skill}.

nodes.speaker: Isaiah
nodes.text: Fine. But {action_answer} me this. To {action_win} this {concept_game}, is it {quality_better} to {action_move} {quality_fast}, or to {action_think} {quality_slow}?

nodes.speaker: Isaiah
nodes.text: Wrong. A {quality_fast} {action_move} without a {quality_good} {concept_plan} is the path to ruin. You must {action_learn} this.

nodes.speaker: Isaiah
nodes.text: Hah! Indeed. This one understands. To {action_think} before you {action_move}... that is the {concept_key} to {concept_victory}.

nodes.speaker: Maria
nodes.text: You have a thoughtful {concept_mind}. That's a rare thing. Isaiah, {action_give} our {quality_new} {person_friend} your spare {item_monocle}.

nodes.speaker: Isaiah
nodes.text: Hmph. Fine. Here. It helps to {action_see} the board more clearly. Maybe it will {action_help} you {action_see} the world more clearly too.

nodes.speaker: Maria
nodes.text: {action_welcome} to our {location_town}. Feel free to watch the {concept_game} anytime.
